Package tsp

Class ShortestPathGraph

java.lang.Object
tsp.ShortestPathGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graph
public class ShortestPathGraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graph

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ShortestPathGraph​(RequestList requestList, CityMap cityMap)
    Create a Graph with vertices of VisitPoint and edges of Path The Graph uses the requestList to create its vertices, and a Dijkstra algorithm with cityMap to find the shortest Path between each of said vertex

  • Method Summary

    void removeVisitPoints​(VisitPoint pickup, VisitPoint delivery)
    remove the VisitPoints from the graph, also deleting the paths to and from said VisitPoints

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ShortestPathGraph

      public ShortestPathGraph​(RequestList requestList, CityMap cityMap)
      Create a Graph with vertices of VisitPoint and edges of Path The Graph uses the requestList to create its vertices, and a Dijkstra algorithm with cityMap to find the shortest Path between each of said vertex
      Parameters:
      requestList - the list of requests in order to create the vertices
      cityMap - the map in order to create the shortest path between 2 vertices
